modules.description: This module processes string sequences using probabilistic dictionary structures. It builds and queries word or character indices from weighted entries, supporting tasks like word segmentation or candidate generation with probability-based ranking. Key operations include dictionary construction, candidate retrieval, and result composition for string analysis.

Implements the MMSEG algorithm for Chinese word segmentation using a sequence of rules to process lists of dictionary chunks. It applies maximum matching, average word length, variance minimization, and probability maximization to disambiguate word boundaries. Used for tokenizing continuous Chinese text into meaningful words based on statistical and dictionary-driven criteria.

Processes string sequences using probabilistic dictionary structures and implements the MMSEG algorithm for Chinese word segmentation. Builds and queries weighted dictionary entries, applies rule-based tokenization to disambiguate word boundaries in continuous text. Used for natural language processing tasks like text analysis and token generation from raw input.
